name: The Sims 4
description: Utilizes Vulkan to greatly improve perfomance.
notes: The game will most likely fail to launch with Origin-In-Game enabled. Please disable it in Origin's preferences to launch The Sims 4.

task.name: winetricks
task.app: nocrashdialog win7 arial faudio d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9

task.name: wineexec
task.description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.

content:
files:
- d9vk: https://github.com/Joshua-Ashton/d9vk/releases/download/0.13f/d9vk-0.13f.tar.gz
- client: https://lutris.nyc3.cdn.digitaloceanspaces.com/games/origin/OriginSetup.exe
- updater: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DrDoctor13/wine-origin-updater/master/updateorigin.sh
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin/Origin.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
    file: d9vk
- copy:
    dst: $HOME/.local/share/lutris/runtime/dxvk/d9vk-0.13f/
    src: $CACHE/dxvk-release/
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: mkdir "$GAMEDIR/nv-shaders"
- write_file:
    content: dxgi.nvapiHack = False
    file: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
- task:
    app: nocrashdialog win7 arial faudio d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /silent
    description: Installing Origin... Login window will pop-up and close.
    exclude_processes: Origin.exe OriginClientService.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
      QtWebEngineProcess.exe
    executable: client
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- chmodx: updater
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Origin
    src: updater
system:
  env:
    DXVK_CONFIG_FILE: $GAMEDIR/dxvk.conf
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC: 60
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR/nv-shaders
  exclude_processes: QtWebEngineProcess.exe ActivationUI.exe OriginWebHelperService.exe
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: d9vk-0.13f
  overrides:
    OriginThinSetupInternal.exe: disabled
    nvapi,nvapi64: disabled
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
